Name: Linea VR
About the game: Meet remastered VR-version of Linea, the Game ! The goal of the game is to survive for more than 60 seconds on each level, dodging platforms and objects, listening to bitpop soundtracks. Eight levels, online-records and achievements are waiting for you. Features: Challenging gameplay, aimed at reaction Eight unique levels, each with its difficulty, design and music 25 achievements, 8 of them are hidden Online leaderboards
Meta Title: Linea VR: Oct 4, 2019, KHB-Soft and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Linea VR? Check out the release date (Oct 4, 2019), developer insights from KHB-Soft, and a complete game summary.
